modal.title: Welcome to GoGospel!
modal.text: Create your account to get started

resetPassword.enterEmail: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password
resetPassword.enterNewPassword: Enter your new password. After that, you can log in with your new password.
resetPassword.emailSent: An email has been sent to your inbox with instructions to reset your password.
resetPassword.loginAgain: After changing your password, you can log in again.
resetPassword.success: Password reset successfully. If the change was made from the app, you can go back to the app and log in with your new password.

bio.label: More information about me
bio.error: The description is required and must be at least 60 characters long

name.label: My name or the name of my ministry
name.error: The name must be at least 3 characters long

ministryType.label: Select the category that best describes your activity

image.label: Upload a photo
image.helper: Add a profile picture that represents you, your ministry, or your organization. Whether itâ€™s a personal photo or an image that reflects your mission, this helps others recognize and connect with you easily.

welcome.title: Welcome to GoGospel!
welcome.text: Complete your profile to start enjoying all the features of the application. We are excited to help you connect with other ministries and volunteers, and together strengthen our community. May this experience be enriching and full of blessings!

finish.title: Profile completed!
finish.text: Your profile is now complete. You can now start connecting with other ministries and volunteers, creating missions, and much more. Welcome to GoGospel!

helper.categories: Select one or more categories that best describe your mission
helper.start: Hello {ministry}, thank you for being part of GoGospel! You will now be guided through the steps to create your own mission, to which volunteers and missionaries can collaborate. Let's get started!
helper.duration: When does your mission start and how long will it last?
helper.location: Select the location where your mission will take place
helper.image: Add an image that represents your mission. It is optional, but recommended. You can change it later if you wish.
helper.summary: Your mission is about to be created. Please review the information before continuing.

fields.title: Title
fields.noStartDate: No start date, or is flexible

placeholder.title: E.g. Volunteer for a summer camp
placeholder.description: E.g. We need volunteers for a summer camp in Valencia. The mission will last for 2 weeks and will take place in the local community.

error.title: The title is invalid
error.description: The description is required and must be at least 60 characters long
error.duration: The duration must be greater than 0
error.startDateAfterToday: The start date must be after today

delete.title: Delete mission
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this mission?

submission.title: Do you want to join {name}?
submission.text: {ministry} will receive a notification and will be able to accept or reject your request. You can write a message to {ministry} introducing yourself and explaining why you would like to join their mission.

errors.message: The message is required and must be at least 40 characters long
errors.alreadySent: You have already sent a request to this mission
errors.notAccepted: The request was not accepted yet. You can open the chat once the request is accepted.

text.accepted: The volunteer will be able to contact you
text.rejected: The volunteer will not be able to contact you or resend the request. You can undo this action at any time.
text.pending: You will be able to accept or reject this volunteer again.

picker.helper: Search for the location of your mission

verificationCode.title: Verification Code
verificationCode.text: Enter the code you received from GoGospel to verify your ministry
verificationCode.label: Code
verificationCode.success: Congrats! Your ministry has been verified!
verificationCode.successText: Now you can enjoy the benefits of being a verified ministry, such as the badge and the possibility of creating missions without waiting for verification.

creation.title: Add Feedback
creation.text: Write a feedback for {name}. This will be visible to everyone, so make sure it is positive and constructive.

placeholder.title: E.g. Amazing experience
placeholder.description: E.g. I had an amazing experience volunteering for this mission. I would definitely recommend it to anyone who wants to make a difference.

errors.title: The rating is required
errors.description: The message is required and must be at least 40 characters long
errors.alreadySent: You have already sent feedback to this user

delete.title: Delete feedback
delete.text: Are you sure you want to delete this feedback?

error.notMissionary: You have to be a missionary to do this
error.notMinistry: You have to be a ministry to do this

missions.title: No missions found
missions.text: There are no missions that match your search criteria. Try again with different filters.

myMissions.title: No missions yet
myMissions.text: You haven't created any missions yet. Create one now!

favorites.title: No favorites yet
favorites.text: You haven't favorited any missions yet. Find one now!

involved.title: No missions yet
involved.text: You haven't joined any missions yet. Find one now!

connections.title: No connections yet
connections.text: You haven't connected with any ministries or volunteers yet. Find one now!

feedbackReceived.title: No feedback yet
feedbackReceived.text: Once the user recieves feedback, it will appear here

feedbackGiven.title: No feedback yet
feedbackGiven.text: Once the user gives feedback, it will appear here

selectChat.title: No chat selected
selectChat.text: Select a chat to start messaging

comingSoon.title: Coming soon!
comingSoon.text: This feature is not available yet. Stay tuned for updates!

somethingWentWrong.title: Oops!
somethingWentWrong.text: Something went wrong. Please try again later.
